sequence.name: Upsell Sequence
sequence.goal: Introduce additional services to existing clients

emails.subject_a: {{first_name}}, Ihre Ergebnisse in den ersten 30 Tagen
emails.subject_b: So hat sich Ihre Online-Präsenz entwickelt
emails.content_brief: Celebrate their results so far. Share specific metrics (traffic, rankings, leads). Build on success momentum. Tease additional possibilities.

emails.preview_text: Wie andere {{industry}} den nächsten Schritt gemacht haben
emails.content_brief: Introduce complementary service based on current package. Show how it multiplies existing results. Include case study of client who added this service.
Exclusive offer for existing clients. Could be discount on additional service, free audit, or priority access. Create urgency with time-limited element.
Soft close. Ask about their goals for the next quarter. Offer strategic call to discuss growth plan. Personal, non-pushy tone.
